00192   template <class QueryParameters, class ListObject>
00193 ListObject* QueryProxy<QueryParameters, ListObject>::list()
00194 {
00195   diet_profile_t* profile = NULL;
00196   std::string sessionKey;
00197   std::string queryParmetersToString;
00198   char* listObjectInString;
00199   char* errorInfo;
00200   std::string msg = "call of function diet_string_set is rejected ";
00201 
00202   //If the query uses the machineId (machineId not null)
00203   if (mmachineId.size() != 0) {
00204     profile = diet_profile_alloc(mserviceName.c_str(), 2, 2, 4);
00205   }
00206   else {
00207     profile = diet_profile_alloc(mserviceName.c_str(), 1, 1, 3);
00208   }
00209 
00210   sessionKey = msessionProxy.getSessionKey();
00211 
00212   const char* name = mserviceName.c_str();
00213   ::ecorecpp::serializer::serializer _ser(name);
00214   //To serialize the mparameters object in to queryParmetersToString
00215   queryParmetersToString =  _ser.serialize(const_cast<QueryParameters_ptr>(&mparameters));
00216   //IN Parameters
00217 
00218   if(diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,0), strdup(sessionKey.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE)) {
00219       msg += "with sessionKey parameter "+sessionKey;
00220       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00221     }
00222 
00223   //If the query uses the machineId (machineId not null)
00224   if (mmachineId.size() != 0) {
00225 
00226     if(diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,1), strdup(mmachineId.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE)) {
00227       msg += "with machineId parameter "+mmachineId;
00228       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00229     }
00230 
00231     if(diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,2), strdup(queryParmetersToString.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE)) {
00232       msg += "with queryParmetersToString parameter "+queryParmetersToString;
00233       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00234     }
00235 
00236     //OUT Parameters
00237     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,3), NULL, DIET_VOLATILE);
00238     diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,4), NULL, DIET_VOLATILE);
00239 
00240     if(!diet_call(profile)) {
00241       if(diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile,3), &listObjectInString, NULL)){
00242         msg += "by receiving listObjectInString message";
00243         raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00244       }
00245       if(diet_string_get(diet_parameter(profile,4), &errorInfo, NULL)){
00246         msg += "by receiving errorInfo message";
00247         raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00248       }
00249     }
00250     else {
00251       raiseDietMsgException("DIET call failure");
00252     }
00253   }
00254   else {
00255 
00256     if(diet_string_set(diet_parameter(profile,1), strdup(queryParmetersToString.c_str()), DIET_VOLATILE)) {
00257       msg += "with queryParmetersToString parameter "+queryParmetersToString;
00258       raiseDietMsgException(msg);
00259     }
00260

00279 
00280 
00281   /*To check the receiving message error*/
00282   raiseExceptionIfNotEmptyMsg(errorInfo);
00283 
00284   //To parse List object serialized
00285   parseEmfObject(std::string(listObjectInString), mlistObject, "Error by receiving List object serialized");
00286 
00287   return mlistObject;
